pageContext.description: Width edge 50.8mm; width mouth 42mm; width loop 10.3mm; breadth mouth 41.5mm; depth socket 70.5mm; depth int. ribs 70.5mm; depth int. ribs 43.5mm; length ext. ribs 35.5mm,Three fine vert. ribs descend from pellets just below second moulding; irregular bumps at foot of central rib and adjacent to another rib - prob. casting flaws; reverse ribs more symmetrically placed - only central one with pellet at head; construction at top of loop; fairly long internal ribs; hammer dents on lower blade, small punchmarks higher; fine grinding marks parallel and perp. to edge; blade tip hollows; flatting bottom to socket; traces of fine casting flash.
pageContext.patina: Much dark green-brown patina, with little gold; alot of reverse obscured by granular lighter green surface.
pageContext.surface: Edge largely good and sharp; odd v. small bits of recent damage. Light orangey-brown soil adhering.
